item.title: Netbeans and Templates
item.author: Author
item.description: We are going to see how to use Netbeans templates, trying to stablish the license in spite of current header. It will be done in two easy steps. First steps. The first thing to do is to add the license we want. We open the menu: “Tool->Templates”, opening the Template Manager. Only to see how is it, we can open the file “Java->Java Class”. If it has not been edited, it is something like:
